description_text:
Hi!

Just got my handbrake pro and so far im impressed, though the light stopped
working in the configuration, is there a hidden Button? The handbrake works
but in the software it doesnt show up when i pull the brake, just in the
light tab, there i can see the color following

Best regards/Erik

conversations.body_text: Hi Erik E,   Please uninstall the old version from your computer first, then download and install the latest SIMSONN Manager 2.1.2.     At the front bottom of the handbrake (indicated by the arrow), there is a small rectangular hole that contains the recovery button. Please use a toothpick to gently push it to the other side, then reconnect the USB cable. The device will enter recovery mode. Next, go to Settings → Update → Manual Firmware Update → handbrake-firmware → handbrake-hbpro.sfu in the software, and complete the update. After the upgrade, make sure to switch the recovery button back to its original position.

Thanks!

Did exactly what you said but no light on the handbrake and dont show upp
on "position" in the app

Best regards  Erik
